title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Veo 2: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Veo 2. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Google Veo 2? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Veo 2
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2026 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Google Veo 2 (video generation) is Google Veo 2 is a state-of-the-art generative AI model designed to create high-quality, realistic videos from text, image, or video prompts. It excels at producing 1080p resolution videos with fine-grained control over cinematic styles, advanced physics simulation, and temporal consistency for coherent motion. Primarily targeting professional creators and filmmakers, it distinguishes itself through deep integration with Google's ecosystem and research in scalable video generation.. Users choose it for video-generation, generative-ai, google-deepmind.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Google Veo 2: Generates 1080p resolution videos up to 60 seconds long from text prompts, Accepts image or video prompts for style and composition control, Advanced physics simulation for realistic motion and object interaction

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Google Veo 2 are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Google Veo 2 for video-generation.
